<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>The column "alotted_time" on the "mtg_agenda_item" table was misspelt when created.  This fix job corrects the spelling of the label for this field in the "sys_documentation" table.</description>
        <name>Fix spelling of "alotted_time"</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(){
	var sysDocGr = new GlideRecord("sys_documentation");
	sysDocGr.addQuery("name", "mtg_agenda_item");
	sysDocGr.addQuery("element", "alotted_time");
	sysDocGr.addQuery("label", "Alotted time");
	sysDocGr.addQuery("language", "en");
	sysDocGr.query();
	
	if (sysDocGr.next()) {
		sysDocGr.label = "Allotted time";
		sysDocGr.plural = "Allotted times";
		sysDocGr.update();
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
